data.meanings: night, evening. layl n.m. (f. laylah, pl. layali)
data.sentence: The word وَاللَّيْلِ comes from the root ل ي ل and is associated with the meanings: night, evening. layl n.m. (f. laylah, pl. layali)

data.meanings: to begin to depart, dissipate the darkness of night. as'asa - to advance, approach, depart, fall in. isas - darkness.
data.sentence: The word عَسْعَسَ comes from the root ع س ع س and is associated with the meanings: to begin to depart, dissipate the darkness of night. as'asa - to advance, approach, depart, fall in. isas - darkness.
